room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by Out Of Time Escape in Charlotte
room_address: 16325 Northcross Drive, Suite B, Huntersville, NC 28078
room_description: Watson has been kidnapped! Sherlock Holmes has been called away on a secret mission for the Queen. He has asked that you and your group of detectives help find Watson’s whereabouts. Can you find Watson before it’s too late? You have one hour before the bobbies arrive and take over the scene!
